outputs.output_descr: Provide an environmentally safe and cost effective alternative technology in ICR sector, Demonstrate the technical and economic feasibility of this alternatives application in the ICR sector in China;

project_descr: Preparation of Hydrochlorofluorocarbon Phase-out Management Plan in Industrial & Commercial Refrigeration Sector in China
project_title: Prepration of HPMP in I&C Refrigeration Sector
